Return only the one-paragraph video description without Markdown formatting or introductory text.

In the background, a workbench is cluttered with tools and bottles, and a green tool board with neatly arranged instruments hangs on the wall. The space is illuminated solely by natural light, as the green-shaded pendant lamps hanging from the ceiling are not turned on. A second man is positioned in the center-left of the room.**
